scripts.copy-assets: shx mkdir -p dist/popup dist/icons dist/audio dist/lib && shx cp src/manifest.json dist/ && shx cp src/background.html dist/ && shx cp src/icons/*.png dist/icons/ && shx cp src/popup/popup.html dist/popup/ && shx cp src/popup/popup.css dist/popup/ && shx cp src/popup/popup-dark.css dist/popup/ && shx cp src/popup/neue-montreal-variable.latin.woff2 dist/popup/ && shx cp -r src/popup/icons dist/popup/icons && shx cp src/audio/notification.mp3 dist/audio/ && shx cp node_modules/webextension-polyfill/dist/browser-polyfill.min.js dist/lib/
scripts.build: npm run clean && tsc && npm run copy-assets
